mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.PERSONAL_TYPE as personalType, a.APPELLATION as appellation, a.LAST_NAME as lastName, a.FIRST_NAME as firstName, a.BIRTHDAY as birthday, a.GENDER as gender, a.MARITAL_STATUS as maritalStatus, a.NUMBER_OF_FAMILY_MEMBERS as numberOfFamilyMembers, a.OTHER_NATIONALITY as otherNationality, a.OTHER_COUNTRIES_OF_BIRTH as otherCountriesOfBirth, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_INFO( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , PERSONAL_TYPE , APPELLATION , LAST_NAME , FIRST_NAME , BIRTHDAY , GENDER , MARITAL_STATUS , NUMBER_OF_FAMILY_MEMBERS , OTHER_NATIONALITY , OTHER_COUNTRIES_OF_BIRTH , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{personalType} , #{appellation} , #{lastName} , #{firstName} , #{birthday} , #{gender} , #{maritalStatus} , #{numberOfFamilyMembers} , #{otherNationality} , #{otherCountriesOfBirth} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_INFO SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_INFO
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
PERSONAL_TYPE ,
APPELLATION ,
LAST_NAME ,
FIRST_NAME ,
BIRTHDAY ,
GENDER ,
MARITAL_STATUS ,
NUMBER_OF_FAMILY_MEMBERS ,
OTHER_NATIONALITY ,
OTHER_COUNTRIES_OF_BIRTH ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{personalType} ,
#{appellation} ,
#{lastName} ,
#{firstName} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_INFO
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
PERSONAL_TYPE = #{personalType} ,
APPELLATION = #{appellation} ,
LAST_NAME = #{lastName} ,
FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} ,
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday} ,
GENDER = #{gender} ,
MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus} ,
NUMBER_OF_FAMILY_MEMBERS = #{numberOfFamilyMembers} ,
OTHER_NATIONALITY = #{otherNationality} ,
OTHER_COUNTRIES_OF_BIRTH = #{otherCountriesOfBirth} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_INFO( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , PERSONAL_TYPE , APPELLATION , LAST_NAME , FIRST_NAME , BIRTHDAY , GENDER , MARITAL_STATUS , NUMBER_OF_FAMILY_MEMBERS , OTHER_NATIONALITY , OTHER_COUNTRIES_OF_BIRTH , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.personalType} , #{item.appellation} , #{item.lastName} , #{item.firstName} , #{item.birthday} , #{item.gender} , #{item.maritalStatus} , #{item.numberOfFamilyMembers} , #{item.otherNationality} , #{item.otherCountriesOfBirth} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_INFO SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , PERSONAL_TYPE = #{item.personalType} , APPELLATION = #{item.appellation} , LAST_NAME = #{item.lastName} , FIRST_NAME = #{item.firstName} , BIRTHDAY = #{item.birthday} , GENDER = #{item.gender} , MARITAL_STATUS = #{item.maritalStatus} , NUMBER_OF_FAMILY_MEMBERS = #{item.numberOfFamilyMembers} , OTHER_NATIONALITY = #{item.otherNationality} , OTHER_COUNTRIES_OF_BIRTH = #{item.otherCountriesOfBirth} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_INFO SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , PERSONAL_TYPE = #{personalType} , APPELLATION = #{appellation} , LAST_NAME = #{lastName} , FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} , BIRTHDAY = #{birthday} , GENDER = #{gender} , MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus} , NUMBER_OF_FAMILY_MEMBERS = #{numberOfFamilyMembers} , OTHER_NATIONALITY = #{otherNationality} , OTHER_COUNTRIES_OF_BIRTH = #{otherCountriesOfBirth} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PER_INFO a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_PER_INFO a WHERE a.DEL_FLAG = 0
